General.Name: Unitech Limited
General.Description: Unitech Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development and related activities in India. It is also involved in the property management, hospitality, power transmission, and investment businesses. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
